verses.text: \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*, \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sheep|strong="H5349"\w* breeders \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tekoa|strong="H8620"\w*, \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w saw|strong="H2372"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w reign|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w reign|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, two \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w earthquake|strong="H7494"\w*.

Amos said: Whenever \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w roars|strong="H7580"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w utters|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w pastures|strong="H4999"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w* becomes arid. God’s Judgment on Israel’s Neighbours

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*’ \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* – \w no|strong="H3808"\w*, \w four|strong="H7969"\w*! – \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* rescind \w my|strong="H3068"\w* judgment. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w threshed|strong="H1758"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w threshing|strong="H1758"\w* \w instruments|strong="H2742"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* fire \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w it|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* devour \w the|strong="H7971"\w* palaces \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w open|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* gate \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* wipe \w out|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w valley|strong="H1237"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aven \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sceptred \w ruler|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Beth-Eden. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Aram \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1540"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Kir|strong="H7024"\w*, says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*’s \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* – \w no|strong="H3808"\w*, \w four|strong="H7969"\w*! – \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* rescind \w my|strong="H3068"\w* judgment. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w carried|strong="H1540"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whole|strong="H8003"\w* nation, sold \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* slaves \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Edom.

\w Therefore|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H2346"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* fire \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H2346"\w* devour \w her|strong="H7971"\w* palaces.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* wipe \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Ashdod, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sceptred \w ruler|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Askelon. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w perish|strong="H3772"\w*, says \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*’s \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* – \w no|strong="H3808"\w*, \w four|strong="H7969"\w*! – \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* rescind \w my|strong="H3068"\w* judgment. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w carried|strong="H3068"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w captive|strong="H1546"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whole|strong="H8003"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w exile|strong="H1546"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Edom, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* brotherly \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H2346"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* fire \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*. \w It|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H2346"\w* devour \w her|strong="H7971"\w* palaces.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* Edom’s \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* – \w no|strong="H3808"\w*, \w four|strong="H7969"\w*! – \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* rescind \w my|strong="H8104"\w* judgment. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* relatives \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, stilled \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w pity|strong="H7356"\w*, cherished \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w anger|strong="H5678"\w* \w continually|strong="H5703"\w*, retained \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w fury|strong="H5678"\w* \w forever|strong="H5703"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H7971"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fire into \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*. \w It|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H7971"\w* destroy \w the|strong="H7971"\w* palaces of \w Bozrah|strong="H1224"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*’ \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* – \w no|strong="H3808"\w*, \w four|strong="H7969"\w*! – \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* rescind \w my|strong="H3068"\w* judgment. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w ripped|strong="H1234"\w* \w open|strong="H1234"\w* \w pregnant|strong="H2030"\w* \w women|strong="H2030"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* lust \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w*.

So \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w kindle|strong="H3341"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fire|strong="H3341"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w*. \w It|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* destroy \w her|strong="H3341"\w* palaces, \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* war-cry \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tempest|strong="H5591"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w exile|strong="H1473"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* nobles \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
